bonus.value: Increase frost ATK by 15%/18%/21%/25% for 10 seconds when switching between frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
When unleashing a Frost Domain with the weapon "Balmung," enemies within the Frost Domain receive frost damage equal to 60%/75%/90%/105% of ATK every second.

mind.name: Soulblade
mind.desc: I will cut off your greed for the forbidden things.

memory.name: Post-Cataclysm
memory.desc: My family... friends... I'm the only one left now...

belief.name: Stance
belief.desc: You have your definition, so what is justice to me?

emotion.name: Doubt
emotion.desc: Who's behind all this? Can anybody tell me?
